txt.en: You explain that hobbits are a peace-loving people, fond of big dinners and comfort, and only rarely embark on adventures. You are careful to point out to Gwynna that though you are a rare exception, you are still a hobbit and have not forgotten your home and friends. 'Well, that is admirable,' he says, 'and is a trait the Falcon Clan holds in high regard.'
Let me tell you about hobbits.
